issue.title: GPU machines can be in a bad state

content.raw:
Here's a backtrace across all threads of `gzserver` compiled in Debug mode from `gazebo_1.3`, when it was stuck during startup because the machine was in the bad state:

    Thread 4 (Thread 0x7fffe51ed700 (LWP 10771)):
    #0  0x00007ffff6bb552d in nanosleep () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
    #1  0x00007ffff7bb4dbd in gazebo::common::Time::MSleep(unsigned int) () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_common.so.1
    #2  0x000000000042e39d in gazebo::Master::Run() ()
    #3  0x00007ffff64a6ce9 in thread_proxy () from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
    #4  0x00007ffff6bade9a in start_thread () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
    #5  0x00007ffff584fcbd in clone () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
    #6  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
 
    Thread 3 (Thread 0x7fffe6006700 (LWP 10770)):
    #0  0x00007ffff5850353 in epoll_wait () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
    #1  0x00007ffff76546b4 in boost::asio::detail::epoll_reactor::run(bool, boost::asio::detail::op_queue<boost::asio::detail::task_io_service_operation>&) () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
    #2  0x00007ffff7654e3e in boost::asio::detail::task_io_service::run(boost::system::error_code&) () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
    #3  0x00007ffff7655435 in boost::asio::io_service::run() () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
    #4  0x00007ffff64a6ce9 in thread_proxy () from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
    #5  0x00007ffff6bade9a in start_thread () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
    #6  0x00007ffff584fcbd in clone () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
    #7  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
 
    Thread 2 (Thread 0x7fffe6807700 (LWP 10769)):
    #0  0x00007ffff6bb1d84 in pthread_cond_wait@@GLIBC_2.3.2 () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
    #1  0x00007ffff7b9e7d9 in gazebo::common::ModelDatabase::UpdateModelCache() () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_common.so.1
    #2  0x00007ffff64a6ce9 in thread_proxy () from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
    #3  0x00007ffff6bade9a in start_thread () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
    #4  0x00007ffff584fcbd in clone () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
    #5  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
 
    Thread 1 (Thread 0x7ffff7fb5840 (LWP 10766)):
    #0  0x00007fffeef55419 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libGL.so.1
    #1  0x00007fffeef55443 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libGL.so.1
    #2  0x00007fffeae86988 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libnvidia-glcore.so.295.40
    #3  0x00007fffeae86aeb in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libnvidia-glcore.so.295.40
    #4  0x00007fffeae24f3d in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libnvidia-glcore.so.295.40
    #5  0x00007fffeadf9b7f in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libnvidia-glcore.so.295.40
    #6  0x00007fffeadf9f35 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libnvidia-glcore.so.295.40
    #7  0x00007fffeae06c01 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libnvidia-glcore.so.295.40
    #8  0x00007fffeae06e88 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libnvidia-glcore.so.295.40
    #9  0x00007fffeadb09a9 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libnvidia-glcore.so.295.40
    #10 0x00007fffead91e60 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libnvidia-glcore.so.295.40
    #11 0x00007fffeef2dde0 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libGL.so.1
    #12 0x00007fffeef2df40 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libGL.so.1
    #13 0x00007fffeef35500 in ?? () from /usr/lib/nvidia-current/libGL.so.1
    #14 0x00007ffff368cb66 in gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine::CreateContext() () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1
    #15 0x00007ffff3690043 in gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine::Load() () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1
    #16 0x00007ffff36961e9 in gazebo::rendering::load() () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1
    #17 0x0000000000421278 in gazebo::Server::LoadImpl(boost::shared_ptr<sdf::Element>) ()
    #18 0x0000000000422038 in gazebo::Server::LoadFile(std::string const&) ()
    #19 0x000000000042303f in gazebo::Server::ParseArgs(int, char**) ()
    #20 0x000000000041d85d in main ()
